text:
All right, Hamster.
I'll go high, you go low.
Otter Punch!

- ( cooing )
- Aww.

I can't punch him.
He's too adorable.
( cooing )
( music playing )

- ( cooing )
- ( screaming )
( roars )

♪ He's wreaking havoc
wherever he goes ♪

- Aww!
- ♪ He's stepping on cars ♪
♪ He's wrecking downtown ♪
♪ But he's got big eyes ♪
♪ And a cute little nose ♪

♪ So it's logistically
challenging to bring him down ♪

♪ The destruction
he's causing is horrible ♪

♪ It's too bad
he's so freaky adorable ♪

♪ He's too perky to pound,
he's too sweet to swat ♪
♪ I'm giving it my all ♪

- Aww!
- ♪ But it's all that I've got ♪

♪ He's an endearing monstrosity
from out of the water ♪
♪ And he must be stopped ♪

♪ But he's too cute
to clobber ♪

♪ I don't want to quit,
he's too cute to clobber ♪

♪ But he's too huggable to hit,
he's too cute to clobber ♪

♪ He's too pretty to punch,
he's too cute to clobber ♪

♪ I'd say we break for lunch,
but why bother? ♪
♪ He's too cute to clobber ♪
All: Aww!
